section.p: For some callback functions that have been listened to, if you no longer need to receive callback messages after receiving the corresponding callback event, you can call this method to remove the corresponding listener.

For some callback functions that have been listened to, if you no longer need to receive callback messages after receiving the corresponding event, you can call this method to remove the corresponding listener.

plentry.pd: The name of the target event to listen to. See .
